**Perception** +18

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +20, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +18, [Ludovica Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +16, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +18, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +18, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +16

ceremonial robes, crystal flower crown, _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +14 

**Ref** +17 

**Will** +18 

</row>

**HP** 140

**Crystal Vitality Link** The power of the island links Mitera's vitality to her followers. As long as any of the three quartz formations are intact (see text), whenever Mitera takes damage, any of her followers within 10 miles lose the same amount of Hit Points.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d4+7 piercing plus 1d6 mental and 1d6 [persistent bleed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Thrown](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d4+7 piercing plus 1d6 mental and 1d6 [persistent bleed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)

**Primal Prepared Spells** DC 26, attack +18
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
- **2nd**
[Entangle](/Spells.aspx?ID=103), [Glitterdust](/Spells.aspx?ID=136), [Tree Shape](/Spells.aspx?ID=342)
- **3rd**
[Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), [Mind of Menace](/Spells.aspx?ID=949), [Soothing Blossoms](/Spells.aspx?ID=999)
- **4th**
[Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [Murderous Vine](/Spells.aspx?ID=953), [Petal Storm](/Spells.aspx?ID=967)

**Ascension is Near** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Frequency** once per ascension ritual; **Effect** Mitera activates the moonflower link with her followers. Any followers within 30 feet who failed their saving throw against the moonflower tea become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34). Anyone who critically failed and did not receive an antidote explodes (this is about half of Mitera's congregation if the PCs didn't successfully administer the antidote). If anyone's body explodes, Mitera gains 30 temporary Hit Points and is [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) for 3 rounds; she can use this additional action each round only for Strike and Stride actions.

</column>
